job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pSeveral days a week will be in our Redwood City office Please be within commuting distanceppbrppstrongWho We ArestrongppTruckLabs is a technology company on a mission to transform the trucking industry through connected hardware and innovative software products We apply advanced engineering and data science techniques to partner with the most advanced fleets in the country to improve their realworld fuel economy  driving bottom line savings and reducing greenhouse gas emissionsnbspOur first product TruckWings is the industrys first active aerodynamics product for Class 8 trucks that automatically closes the tractortrailer gap at highway speeds Deployed across major national fleets TruckWings have completed over 250 million miles of highway drivingnbspTruckWings are controlled by a proprietary cloudconnected telematics device which both operates and measures the performance of TruckWings and the trucksnbspWith these technologies we are making a dent in the 300M metric tons of greenhouse gas emissions produced annually by tractortrailers while also increasing the profitability of our customers Learn more at wwwtrucklabscomppbrppCandidates need to have 35 years of experience with proven results in structuring processing and visualizing raw data to create business impacting insights and supporting productsnbspThis position will be based out of our office in Redwood City CaliforniappbrppAbout YouppWe are looking for a very curious data scientist who enjoys a deep dive into the raw data to ask the right set of questions and find the answers to those questionsnbspYou will build tools and infrastructure that provide data cleansing amp transformation create statistical predictive and optimization models leading to actionable insights for new data products as well as performance metrics to drive business and product improvements You will analyze onroad data with a finetoothed comb and develop product requirements from first principles Your analysis will be critical in setting direction for the product and engineering teamsppbrppWhat Youll DopulliYou will own the analytical frameworks that drive decision making and direction for the product roadmapliliEnrich insights by supplementing telematics data with relevant data sourcesliliBuild models from the ground up  from data exploration to feature engineering model development  optimization and deployment into productionliliDesign rigorous experiments and interpret results to draw actionable conclusionsliliWork crossfunctionally with team leaders in Engineering Product Operations Marketing etc to explain your analysis and make recommendationsliliFacilitate objective decision making across the company by democratizing data through dashboards and other analytical toolsliliOperationalize data gathering and machinelearning infrastructureliulpbrppRequired Skills and ExperiencepulliBachelors Degree in Statistics Computer Science Mathematics or other quantitative field advanced degree a pluslili3 years of experience working as a data scientistliliKnowledge of machine learning techniques especially deep understanding for their benefits and drawbacks in realworld applicationsliliExcellent statistical intuition derived from practical handson experienceliliProficiency in Python SQL PySpark and ETL patterns and toolsliliExperience with scientific computing and analysis packages such as NumPy SciPy Pandas dplyr or ggplot2liliExperience with machine learning libraries and packages such as Scikitlearn PyTorch Caffe2 TensorFlow Keras or TheanoliliExperience working on Cloud computing technology AWSGoogle CloudMicrosoft AzureliliExperience in the design analysis and interpretation of AB tests in a large data environmentnbspliliExperience building predictive systemsliliAbility to work in a fastpaced and continuously changing environmentliulpbrppPreferred SkillspulliExperience with GIS data including Google Maps PlatformliliUnderstanding of Big Data Technologies like Apache Hadoop Apache Spark and MapReduceliliKnowledge in the Transportation or Logistics domainliul
